stepTitle: James and Kathy are racing on roller skates. They race along a long, straight truck, and whoever has gone the farthest after $$5$$ sec wins a prize. If James can skate at a velocity of $$f(t)=2t+5$$ $$\frac{ft}{sec}$$ and Kathy can skate at a velocity of $$g(t)=cos\left(\frac{pit}{2}\right)+10$$ $$\frac{ft}{sec}$$, who is going to win the race?
